memberdef.name: fips_methods

memberdef.name: ssh_kex_descriptions
memberdef.initializer: = { "kex algos", "server host key algo", "encryption client->server", "encryption server->client", "mac algo client->server", "mac algo server->client", "compression algo client->server", "compression algo server->client", "languages client->server", "languages server->client", NULL }

briefdescription.para: sets the key exchange parameters to be sent to the server, in function of the options and available methods.
Select the different methods on basis of client's and server's kex messages, and watches out if a match is possible.
